=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/02/25 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael J. Bassett'], 'Producers': ['Don Carmody', 'Samuel Hadida'], 'Starring': ['Adelaide Clemens', 'Kit Harrington', 'Deborah Kara Unger']} Review Text: Its lacks the cutting edge the original had, lame plot and bad acting inthe main roles. I wouldnt recommend it unless you really like horror movies.. Review Title: Its lacks the cutting edge Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/07/02 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'Español', 'Português'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Pitof'], 'Producers': ['Denise Di Novi', 'Edward McDonnell'], 'Starring': ['Halle Berry', 'Halle Berry', 'Sharon Stone'], 'Studio': ['WARNER HOME VIDEO']} Review Text: The only reason I gave this two star is because it has Halle Berry in it wearing outfits that dont leave much to the imagination.

I've seen more realistic fight scenes in Disney cartoon. The plot could have been somewhat tolerable if they'd stuck to the Comics and not made it some teenage bubble gum movie.

Review Title: ... this is one of those movies made from a great book deep in meaning and plot Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Blacklist Review Date: 2016/05/18 Categories: Suspense, Drama Product Description: ['Now a fugitive on the run, Liz must figure out how to protect herself from the fallout of her actions in the explosive Season 2 finale.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael Watkins'], 'Starring': ['James Spader', 'Diego Klattenhoff', 'Megan Boone']} Review Text: Love this series, it got away from the clever twisted plots but its getting back there. Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/05/18 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Gil Kenan'], 'Producers': ['Sam Raimi', 'Robert Tapert', 'Roy Lee', 'Doug Davison', 'Nathan Kahane'], 'Starring': ['Sam Rockwell', 'Rosemarie DeWitt', 'Jared Harris'], 'Studio': ['20th Century Fox']} Review Text: No where near as good as the original. Review Title: Two Stars Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/05/18 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['George Miller'], 'Producers': ['Doug Mitchell', 'George Miller', 'P.J. Voeten'], 'Starring': ['Tom Hardy', 'Charlize Theron', 'Nicholas Hoult']} Review Text: If you're not expecting the rawness of the original its not a bad movie. Kill then drive and repeat about 1100 times. Review Title: ... expecting the rawness of the original its not a bad movie. Kill then drive and repeat about 1100 ... Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Genre Affinity**: Strong inclination towards horror, suspense, and family-friendly movies, with some interest in wacky or foreign films.
- **Content Sensitivity**: Often critiques films with excessive nudity, violence, and foul language, indicating a preference for more nuanced or meaningful content.
- **Rating Trends**: Tends to give lower ratings to films perceived as lacking depth or coherence, often mentioning slow pacing and mediocre acting.
- **Notable Directors/Actors**: Shows favoritism towards well-known directors and actors. Positive experiences linked with specific studios (e.g., Warner, Buena Vista).
- **Mixed Experiences**: Reviews reflect a mix of enjoyment for clever plots and familial themes versus disappointment in poorly executed adaptations and unrealistic portrayals.
- **Cinematic Expectations**: Expects films to hold true to original source material, especially in adaptations, alongside an appreciation for compelling storylines over action alone.
- **Comedy Preference**: Highly rates comedic content, signifying a robust preference for humor in contrast to rated dramas or darker themes.
- **Critical Feedback**: Engaged and analytical reviewer, articulating reasons for ratings, suggesting a forthcoming and thoughtful approach to viewing media.

target_interaction.title: Five Stars
target_interaction.text: There used to a reason for having Amazon prime. Now I have to buy it
description: Now in its 39th season, NOVA is the most-watched primetime science series on American television, reaching an average of five million viewers weekly.
target_interaction.subtitle: Season 8
